title: Free Rosetta
description: Free_Rosetta is a suite of ML tools to transcribe speech to text, then translate to other language. Instead of processing ML job in backend, I brought @Xenova/transformer to process tasks in frontend.

title: Admin Dashboard App
description: An Admin dashboard displays users and products info, backed by Auth0 to authorize and authenticate admin and client to access different resources. Try it with username:'test1', password:'1234'

title: Game Hub App
description: Game Hub App shows popular games info, backed by Rawg.io. User could interact with backend information
